locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ üöø Shower ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Also, the shower was very clean and the adjoining restroom was clean and smelled very good.

The place is big not huge but it does the work with 15 shower which is great so you don't have to wait most of the time. Inside you can find a Denny's for breakfast. Parking is big and comfortable and it's good for a long stay.

I use pilot and flying j as a network. Stopped to get shower and had to wait ..so while waiting  I asked counter lady if they had someone  cleaning  showers ,of course she called him and he said he was cleaning .after 5 minutes  he came in ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I got shower #7 when I finally finished my hike from where I parked. It was small but pretty clean! I will say the water pressure kinda sucked. The only saving grace was that you can change the way the water comes out and concentrate it a ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Shower / Restroom facility was spotless. No wait for anything at any counter. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ quite dirty but the guy working the back came and cleaned them immediately so kudos to him!) The shower was hot, great pressure, and very clean. Ok so the Kiosk wasn't working, big deal. Who cares about a Kiosk when everyone that worked ‚Ä¶
Very kind people, nice and decent shower's

‚Ä¶ cold and bossy. If you don't want to work, go home. I showered to the sound of loud hard metal music from directly across from my shower. I guess it is Flying J policy to play loud hard metal music for the showers, now. I felt disdain for, ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ 4th to go order was given out, and we still hadn't gotten our food we just left. So we went over to take a shower without supper, and waited 40 minutes for a shower. We finally got to eat soup in our truck for the 3rd night in a row @ 9 ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Petro Travel Center
locations.content: Petro Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Very large truck parking area, doesn't fill up due to so many truck stops in this area which is a plus., all the dryers and washers work. Shower rooms are very clean and detailed. The gym area has all the attachments and is very clean and ‚Ä¶
David McleanLocal Guide ¬∑ 836 reviews ¬∑ 960 photos

Just stopped here for a few minutes on our drive to gas up and use the bathroom. Bathroom was super clean, even had a sign that "Clean Bathroom Guarantee" with a QR code to report something that needs maintenance. The ladies working the ‚Ä¶
It is a pretty nice petro. Decently clean. A good parking lot.  The "cinema" room is a joke. There's no remote to change the channels.
Nice Petro, huge parking lot, clean store, working fuel pumps ( unlike most T/As) a plus, good food in restaurant and clean. About as good as it gets for a truck stop.

locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ lobs some of the parking is slanted so just be careful where you park. Washer and dryer work and is only $2.50 which is a plus. Showers were nice, hot and clean. My only issue with them is that there was no shelf to place down your ‚Ä¶
David McleanLocal Guide ¬∑ 836 reviews ¬∑ 960 photos
Showers were clean but didn't have the lower shower head like most loves. Staff was professional and curious.

The shower (5) had warm at best water.  Toilet in shower (which is always supposed to have been cleaned) was not clean and had pubic hairs on it. But at least the water pressure wasn't as horrible as many Loves.

It‚Äôs okay. Stayed overnight and used the showers twice, once that night and the next morning. Staff seemed to act busy, but I was there at about midnight and there were very few people there. When I got the slip for the shower there was no ‚Ä¶

We came to this Loves to take a shower. We got shower 6 on the app. It was the handicap shower. There was mold in the tile where the grout is. Pretty disgusting. Other than that the store was fine. I went up to the front and told them and ‚Ä¶
Nice, clean, hot shower. 2 clean towels provided. Also used their laundry - clean, quick and adorable. Only dryer, so did have to a wait bit to dry. Staff was friendly and efficient. Recommend.

I went into the shower room to find pubic hair everywhere! Don‚Äôt get me wrong, I love a man that manscapes, I just don‚Äôt want to have to deal with it when I use the shower! Shame on your shower porter for not doing a better job preparing ‚Ä¶
Nice place got a shower quick and bathrooms are clean.

Staff busy talking by disel desk when I'm standing there waiting over an hr for a shower and they were aware, as my clock keeps ticking away to drive. Then I go back and check and nope the guy cleaning isn't cleaning like she sad all rude ‚Ä¶

Friendly staff, decent lot, etc., but how about actually cleaning the showers? That's more than spray some bleach, run a mop over the floor. CLEAN THE SHOWERS! This is Shower #6 @0830 on June 18, 2023.

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I want to thank the cashier, Kat, for her patience and perseverance, she put all her effort and knowledge into finding my shower points. I am extremely grateful to her for her help! Thank you

The showers are totally disgusting. Something I would expect at a flip-flops truckstop. I almost did not take the shower, but I‚Äôve been running hard and I‚Äôm due for one. The men‚Äôs bathroom smells like urine ammonia. The ladies in the Taco ‚Ä¶
What was suppose to be a 30 minute break shower, turns into well over an hour. Nobodies in the showers. But nobodies cleaning them. I‚Äôm so done with TA.

I bought a shower at that location and weighted 4 an hour and the employee was taking a lunch break for 30 minutes and people wanna take a shower anyways, so they can relax. Take a break from driving.
Customers always comes first

‚Ä¶ this is the perfect spot to spend the night. The parking lot is huge and everybody  place was great I've always loved truck stops of America there's a shower amenity is awesome and the stories well cap with plenty of items to choose from.

The staff was friendly, the place is clean and the shower felt wonderful. It has a Taco Bell inside and they did a wonderful job with our food. There is also lots of parking for overnight trucks.

Repair shop sucks though.
I am waiting for the shower 1our .just leave 2min is missing. I want to change new ticket...She says NO.what hell!

Plenty of parking and the facility is decent, but the showers really need some work. I'm afraid to step foot in there without some thick shower shoes. Too much mold and soap scum from improper or no cleaning. Some showers have a really bad ‚Ä¶
Paid for shower as the app said there was no wait. Got inside and no clean showers and worker was sitting on his phone. Water also scalding hot.

Stop here often to fuel, shower and eat.   I confess to being a Taco Bell addict.  And I just discovered the work -around for the old Grilled Stuft burrito,  which for some reason they took off the menu.   Thanks TB for taking off your most ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Fuel Mart
locations.content: Fuel Mart may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Great gas prices, and it's an easy detour from the Ohio Turnpike / 280 / 75. The restrooms are smaller than many of the truck stops, but no issues.
Excellent gas station!  A model of a small size place with clean bathrooms, well stocked convenience store and correctly advertised prices.  Thanks for getting us refueled and refreshed.

I usually stop here because they'll be a penny cheaper than everybody else, but I probably will start going elsewhere because they aren't providing windshield washer squeegees and the couple they do have are tattered and torn. It's not worth saving the penny if I can't wash my windshields while I'm there.
Great place to get fuel I love the Hunt Brothers Pizza and the Subway also a great clean gas station and store. Also the employees treat you like family in the store.

Gr8 service and price of diesel and def also good in area ..employees are nice and always working hard ..restroom clean .. Hunt pizza and subway ..wish they have more coffee collection ..get point card and they have showers too..30 cent less diesel price than neighbors pilot love ta.yes they add new coffee machine
Really easy to get into and out of. Nice selection of snacks and drinks and the restrooms have been clean every time I've stopped.
Nice and clean restrooms. Very pleasant workers. Cute, little truckstop. Thank you

I stopped at this truck stop and fueled up 100 gallons of diseal for my truck and asked for shower and the lady at the counter make stories that you should have rewards card then only you will get shower and denied for shower and when i ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: A really nice truck stop. Easy parking. Clean lot. Didn't smell. Fuel islands very cleaned and all 8 or so pumps working. The store was clean and very well stocked. The woman's bathroom was spotless. They don't charge for parking. They ‚Ä¶

What a neat stop! Clean bathrooms & store & organized. Lots of neat ‚Äúfoods on the go‚Äù, snacks & treats. Cool toys/Souvenirs. Pretty quick service. Personnel were on the quiet end, you say hello or goodbye & no one really responds back. ‚Ä¶
10$ showers. They are clean and have good pressure with hot water. Toilet and sink. Mean fattie at night though.
Owner is really cool and the workers are awesome, clean bathrooms and showers. Been going here for years with zero problems.
Good honemade candies doghnuts ect.. plus always clean R.R. plus pilot across street to busy ...

Gr8 truck stop ..big and easy parking for trucks ..Gr8 customer service ..new showers and restroom..and diesel price awesome..20 cent cheaper than pilot ..winterized diesel ..2.59 $ wow gr8 ..lot of toys for trucks inside ..

Rest stop should remove the metal from out the shower to prevent someone cutting themselves contracting a flesh eating bacteria causing whom ever to have medical treatment or amputation. I advise yall to remove all metal from yall showers ‚Ä¶
Nice place to do laundry and a shower.
Clean restrooms and shower with plenty of parking
Trucker friendly with free shower

showerReviews.reviewText: David McleanLocal Guide ¬∑ 836 reviews ¬∑ 960 photos

Old BUT well maintained. The store is organized and showers clean, also laundry facilities clean and cheap- $2.50 for a wash or a dry.
The night staff were also very kind and friendly.
I like this place a lot! Keep it up! üëçüèª ‚Ä¶

decent love's. parking is plentiful and easy enough to get in to. there were still a few spots available at midnight. the showers were clean enough but my PIN didn't want to work for mine so i had to call an employee over, who was helpful.
Good Love's, clean showers, spacious parking, friendly stuff
Really clean and good showers with alot of pressure and really hot water.

This place has just about everything you can think of very well organized very clean as an Arby's also has plenty of handicap spots as you can see every gas selection you can think of the car rental showers for truckers they've got everything you can think of

Lots of parking for weary travelers needing a nap or pit stop patrons. Dog park near entrance when drove in. Plenty of snacks and typical Loves needs for customers available. Clean bathroom is a norm I appreciate when on long road trips. ‚Ä¶

Like most Love's the experience here is first rate. Clean, well maintained facilities. Friendly staff. The c - store is one of the best you'll ever see at a highway truck stop. Lots of apparel and accessories. I got winter gloves at a good ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Paid $10 for a cold shower. Foreign guy behind the counter was going to refund my money but I told him I was staying overnight, and that we would even up on it. Ate dinner, waitress "got distracted and forgot my order". Went back to the ‚Ä¶
Parking lot is a swamp in the back row... Better bring your own towel for shower..but big beer cave. And hot food most of the day.

‚Ä¶ understanding of our situation. She offered a couch for us to sleep on, a shower, towels & food for our entire 2 day stay until we could get some one to come trailer us off the premisis and back home to MI. During this stay the staff ‚Ä¶
Nice family owned business. Not your typical big chain truck stops. Nicely priced shower, and laundry facilities.
